title: Top of the World NCAA Festive Ugly Christmas Santa Hat Beanie
features: Christmas is your favorite time of year, but a little TEAM PRIDE can make any holiday a little better. Combine your holiday spirit with a little of your die-hard fan enthusiasm when you west this Ugly X-Mas Santa Beanie Hat from Top of the World

FEATURES: These Men's College Ugly X-Mas Santa Hats feature Official Team Names surrounded by Ugly Christmas patterns including Christmas Trees, Reindeer and Snowflakes. Embroidered 3D Team Logo on the white cuff and pom at the end completes the Santa Look. Made of WARM and DUrABLE 100% Acrylic. One Size Fits Most
These winter Alabama Crimson Tide Santa hats make great holiday & Secret Santa gifts, and superb stocking stuffers for teens & adults from the North Pole to the South. One size fits most.
GREAT GIFT for the College Football or Basketball Fan in your life. Perfect for CHRISTMAS MORNING, Holiday Parties, Tailgating during the Holiday Season or just because.
description: The holidays are your favorite time of year, but a little Team Pride can make any day a little better. Combine your holiday spirit with a little of your die-hard fan enthusiasm when you wear this Top of the World Ugly Santa Hat-Beanie.
